stories.text: "Self-directed" might not be the exact word. I'm in a team where almost everyone has other commitments, sometimes taking priority at random, and I'd like it if there was a tool where I could go and announce "I'm not going to be working today...".
stories.title: Ask HN: Tools for tracking self-directed remote teams?

stories.text: I've been in the service related business for almost four years now. I provided a service for people who want to make VR apps. But, I still struggle to build a system that runs without me being involved in technical things. And from the financial aspect, I often feel insecure and worry if we can cover the company's expenses for the next several months. I just feel that my life and the life my company depends on the projects that's still a mystery right now. With all those experience and feeling, I start to question; is providing service is a scalable business model?
stories.title: Is providing service scalable business?
